nodes.text: Lao-mon (or Sh'shuun in Shi'idese) was the jungle covered homeworld of the shapeshifting Shi'ido as well as many large predators. The Shi'ido choose to remain private from the rest of the galaxy and noted that they would contact the New Republic when they felt comfortable doing so.
This planet is named Lao-man in The New Essential Guide to Alien Species and Laomon in Darth Plagueis.
